original_text: When Paul and his companions had passed through Amphipolis and Apollonia, they came to Thessalonica, where there was a Jewish synagogue.
korean_text: 그들이 암비볼리와 아볼로니아로 다녀가 데살로니가에 이르니 거기 유대인의 회당이 있는지라

sentences.original_text: When Paul and his companions had passed through Amphipolis and Apollonia
sentences.korean_translation: 바울과 그의 동행자들이 암피볼리와 아볼로니아를 지났을 때

sentences.original_text: where there was a Jewish synagogue
